bibl.title: Six Small Byzantine Papyri from the Duke Collection.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: 1. Inv. 1044. Fragment with Consular Date. IV. - 2. Inv. 1142. Dating Clause by the Oxyrhynchite Era. 27 November 436. - 3. Inv. 509. Fragment of Petition with Consular Date. 483 or 484. - 4. Inv. 467. Register of Persons. V/VI. - 5. Inv. 1133. Fragment of ÍpomnhstikÒn. V/VI. - 6. Inv. 1140. List of Items. VI/VII. <hupomnestikon>
